params.name: vocab_size
params.description: Vocabulary size of the XGLM model. Defines the number of different tokens that can be represented by theinputs_ids passed when calling XGLMModel or FlaxXGLMModel.

params.name: max_position_embeddings
params.description: The maximum sequence length that this model might ever be used with. Typically set this to something largejust in case (e.g., 512 or 1024 or 2048).

params.name: d_model
params.description: Dimension of the layers and the pooler layer.

params.name: ffn_dim
params.description: Dimension of the intermediate (often named feed-forward) layer in decoder.

params.name: num_layers
params.description: Number of hidden layers Transformer decoder.

params.name: attention_heads
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in the Transformer decoder.

params.name: activation_function
params.description: The non-linear activation function (function or string) in the encoder and pooler. If string, gelu,relu, silu and gelu_new are supported.

params.name: dropout
params.description: The dropout probability for all fully connected layers in the embeddings, dencoder, and pooler.

params.name: attention_dropout
params.description: The dropout ratio for the attention probabilities.

params.name: activation_dropout
params.description: The dropout ratio for activations inside the fully connected layer.

params.name: layerdrop
params.description: The LayerDrop probability for the encoder. See the [LayerDrop paper](see https://arxiv.org/abs/1909.11556)for more details.

params.name: init_std
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.

params.name: scale_embedding
params.description: Scale embeddings by diving by sqrt(d_model).

params.name: use_cache
params.description: Whether or not the model should return the last key/values attentions (not used by all models).
